verses.text: And the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H6817"\w*, and \w went|strong="H5674"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*, Wherefore passedst thou \w over|strong="H5674"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and didst not \w call|strong="H7121"\w* us to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with thee? we will \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* upon thee with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.\f + \fr 12.1 \ft gathered…: Heb. were called\f*

And \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, I and my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* at \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w strife|strong="H0376"\w* with the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*; and when I \w called|strong="H2199"\w* you, ye \w delivered|strong="H3467"\w* me not out of their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

And when I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that ye \w delivered|strong="H3467"\w* \add me\add* not, I \w put|strong="H7760"\w* my \w life|strong="H5315"\w* in my \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, and passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: wherefore then are ye come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto me this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against me?

Then \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* gathered \w together|strong="H6908"\w* all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* with \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*: and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, because they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye \w Gileadites|strong="H1568"\w* \add are\add* \w fugitives|strong="H6412"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w Ephraimites|strong="H0669"\w*, \add and\add* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w Manassites|strong="H4519"\w*.

And the \w Gileadites|strong="H1568"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the \w passages|strong="H4569"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* before the \w Ephraimites|strong="H0669"\w*: and it was \add so\add*, that when those \w Ephraimites|strong="H0669"\w* which were \w escaped|strong="H6412"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let me go \w over|strong="H5674"\w*; that the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \add Art\add* thou an \w Ephraimite|strong="H0673"\w*? If he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Nay;

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* they unto him, \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* now \w Shibboleth|strong="H7641"\w*: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Sibboleth|strong="H5451"\w*: for he could not \w frame|strong="H3559"\w* to \w pronounce|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add* \w right|strong="H3559"\w*. Then they \w took|strong="H0270"\w* him, and \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* him at the \w passages|strong="H4569"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*: and there \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of the \w Ephraimites|strong="H0669"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

And \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. Then \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* the \w Gileadite|strong="H1569"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in \add one of\add* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.
¶ And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him \w Ibzan|strong="H0078"\w* of \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he had \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \add whom\add* he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*, and \w took|strong="H0935"\w* in \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* from \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w* for his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*. And he \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.
Then \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w Ibzan|strong="H0078"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* at \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*.

¶ And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him \w Elon|strong="H0356"\w*, a \w Zebulonite|strong="H2075"\w*, \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and he \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And \w Elon|strong="H0356"\w* the \w Zebulonite|strong="H2075"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in \w Aijalon|strong="H0357"\w* in the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*.

¶ And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him \w Abdon|strong="H5658"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hillel|strong="H1985"\w*, a \w Pirathonite|strong="H6553"\w*, \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he had \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w nephews|strong="H1121"\w*, that \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* on threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* ass \w colts|strong="H5895"\w*: and he \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.\f + \fr 12.14 \ft nephews: Heb. sons’ sons\f*

And \w Abdon|strong="H5658"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hillel|strong="H1985"\w* the \w Pirathonite|strong="H6553"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in \w Pirathon|strong="H6552"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of the \w Amalekites|strong="H6003"\w*.
